source_sentence: 能調於人調御者，　　唯願普眼尊久住，

source_sentence: 「『我已為世作利益，　　說如是等諸法教，

source_sentence: 我已充滿諸菩薩，　　令住諸佛無漏中。

source_sentence: 即於此夜後分時，　　我當入般於涅槃，

translation: Now, I'll entrust this teaching of the Dharma to you, so that the Bhagavān will abide for a long time after his passing away.'

source_sentence: 彼眾聞作是語已，　　彼諸菩薩皆合掌，

source_sentence: 咸共瞻仰彼如來，　　悲泣雨淚作是言：

source_sentence: 『唯願兩足尊慰喻，　　我及百千眾生等，

source_sentence: 尊滅度後誰作佛？　　世尊於諸世間上。』
translation: Who will become a buddha after the parinirvāṇa of this venerable one?’

source_sentence: 哀愍軟語而告言，　　慰喻世間天人等：
translation: With compassion and gentle words, he told them, comforting the gods and humans of the world,

source_sentence: 『我滅比丘莫懷怖，　　我後復當佛出世。

source_sentence: 有菩薩名功德分，　　修行得至無漏智，
translation: There is a bodhisattva named Virtue Part, Who practices and attains untainted knowledge.

source_sentence: 於未來世當作佛，　　名曰智焰兩足尊。
translation: In the future, he'll become a buddha named the two-legged honored one with the flame of wisdom.

source_sentence: 我今勸請汝當知，　　為欲攝持此法故，

translation: Having heard the World-honored One’s discourse like this, They immediately comforted them and further said:

source_sentence: 『大神通力此甚難，　　無攝受法攝受故，
translation: 'This is a great difficulty of great supernormal powers, because there's no way to gather in the taking in of qualities.

source_sentence: 我為導師尊重故，　　我今攝受於正法。
translation: Because of my respect as a guide, I now take in the right teaching.

source_sentence: 我當廣宣此法教，　　我當捨身及壽命，
translation: I will extensively expound this teaching of the Dharma. I will give up my body and my life.

source_sentence: 不護己身壽命等，　　乃可守護如來法。
translation: If you don't protect your own life and so forth, then you can guard the Tathāgata's teaching.

source_sentence: 若不甞愛己身者，　　彼即能護教師法。』
translation: If someone doesn't hate and love themselves, they'll be able to protect the teacher's teaching.'

source_sentence: 右膝著地，合掌向佛，而說偈言：「爾時，世尊為欲利益諸天世人，以偈報彼利益上菩薩言：「善男子！

source_sentence: 爾時彼佛慰喻彼諸一切大眾令歡喜已，說法教誨與威力已，於夜後分入於涅槃。
translation: After comforting all the masses of people and making them rejoice, that Buddha then explained the teaching and gave them authority, and he entered nirvāṇa at night.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 彼時世尊入涅槃後，彼菩薩說滿足八十千數法門，如是隨順成就眾生，
translation: “After the World-honored One had entered nirvana, that bodhisattva expounded eighty-thousand teachings on how to fulfill these eighty-thousand principles.

source_sentence: 多那由他百千眾生，當得成熟於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提中，況復住於聲聞乘者、辟支佛乘者，
translation: Hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of sentient beings will attain perfect enlightenment, much less those who abide in the vehicle of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

source_sentence: 況復流轉於生死中種善根者？
translation: How much more so when he's cultivating good roots in birth-and-death?

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 彼佛如來般涅槃後，正法滅已，於像法中多有比丘，說有可得說有可滅，
translation: “After the parinirvana of those buddhas and tathāgatas, when the true-dharma ceases, there will be many bhikṣus in the assembly whose doctrine is like this: they will assert that there is something to be attained and say that there is something to be destroyed.

source_sentence: 彼等於是諸修多羅不樂受持復生誹謗。
translation: They then don't delight in accepting and upholding the sūtras, and they further denigrate them.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 於彼時中此閻浮提，有一人王名勇健力，果報廣大。
translation: At the time, there was a man named King in this Jambudvīpa named Courageous and powerful, whose rewards were vast.

source_sentence: 爾時彼利益上菩薩比丘，至彼王所為說佛法，說於如來祕密之教。
translation: It was then that the superior bodhisattva monk Upagupta went to the king's place to explain the Buddha's teachings and explained the secret teachings of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 彼王聞已，即於上利益比丘生敬重心，即發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心供養比丘。
translation: After hearing this, the king immediately became respectful to the above-mentioned monk for his benefit and gave rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment as an offering to the monk.

source_sentence: 而彼比丘，欲教化彼諸眾生故，於一切處受諸供養，不生厭悔不生倦心。
translation: That monk, because he wants to teach those sentient beings, receives offerings everywhere and doesn't become disillusioned or weary.

source_sentence: 「彼王供養彼比丘已，滿足三月，及於八萬四千采女，各自莊嚴持諸香華，
translation: “Three months had passed since that king had offered support to that monk, and each of the eighty-four thousand nymphs adorned themselves with incense and flowers.

source_sentence: 及諸音樂眾寶瓔珞塗香衣服，如是等事供養比丘，及彼比丘所有門徒，
translation: The monks, their music, jeweled necklaces, fragrant robes, perfumed clothing, and such things were offered to the monks, and all the disciples of those monks.

source_sentence: 八千五百常相隨順，一切皆得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: The eighty-five hundred always follow each other, and they all attain unregressing unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 於彼之時，難調怨讐殺害人者而為比丘，名曰寂定威儀，善說法要多聞總持，
translation: At the time, he was a monk who had difficulty taming enemies and killing people. He was called Silent Concentration and Dignified Restraint. He was well versed in the Dharma and well-versed in all the doctrines of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 滿足十千修多羅等，誦持通利，能廣分別諸修多羅，常說少欲知足法義。
translation: He fulfills 10,000 sūtras and so forth, recites them with penetrating benefit, discerns them extensively, and always explains the meaning of the teaching of having few desires and being satisfied.

source_sentence: 而彼比丘已得四禪，復得五通四無色定，而彼寂定威儀比丘多有徒眾，
translation: That monk has already attained the fourth absorption and further attained the five supernormal knowledges and the four formless concentrations.

source_sentence: 其數五百共相隨逐，亦有如是威儀勝行。
translation: The five hundred attendants were also accompanying each other in common, and they had such superior conduct.

source_sentence: 「爾時，寂定威儀比丘，見彼利益上菩薩比丘，不憙不悅生於惡心，發瞋恚意現於惡色，
translation: “At the time, that monk in quiet concentration with deportment saw that superior bodhisattva monk who was benefiting them, became neither angry nor pleased and gave rise to bad thoughts, and became angry and showed bad forms.

source_sentence: 在眾人前說如是言：『如此比丘！
translation: He spoke before the crowd and said, 'So it is, monk!

source_sentence: 何處有於菩提之行？
translation: Where is there the practice of enlightenment?

source_sentence: 何處有於諸佛之法？
translation: Where is there a teaching of the buddhas?

source_sentence: 如是雜行，於世間行威儀尚無，況復當有證於勝智？』
translation: Such a mixed practice is still absent in worldly conduct and mannerisms, so how could there be realization of superior cognition?'

source_sentence: 而彼眾人一向唯信利益上菩薩比丘，無能壞者。
translation: Those people have always believed only in benefiting the superior bodhisattva monks, and there's no one who can destroy them.

source_sentence: 爾時寂定威儀比丘，復增瞋恨轉更增上，從彼地方背面而去：『我不復憙見是惡事，
translation: At that time, the bhikṣu Siṃhalasamādhi威儀 bhikṣu became increasingly angry and further increased in intensity. He departed from that place with his palms together [in respect] and said:

source_sentence: 若此比丘行於邪見，令諸人眾皆行顛倒。』
translation: If this monk conducts himself with wrong views, he causes all people to conduct themselves in error.'

source_sentence: 至蘭若處欲入三昧，以有瞋恨彼彼三昧不能順入，況復能定？
translation: When he wants to enter samādhi at the place where he goes, he's angry because he can't follow and enter those samādhis, so why would he be able to concentrate?

source_sentence: 彼有如是強力行故，所有禪定三摩拔提，及五神通一切皆失，彼以如是恚惡心，
translation: Because they have such powerful actions, all of their meditations, samāpattis, and the five supernormal powers are lost.

source_sentence: 故得大重病。
translation: That's why they'll attain a serious illness.

source_sentence: 「爾時，彼利益上菩薩比丘，作如是念：『希有乃至如此比丘，生大不善瞋恚濁意，
translation: At the time, that monk Beneficent to the Superior Bodhisattva had this thought: Rarely is such a monk born with great unwholesome anger and turbidity of mind.

source_sentence: 我於今者應生憐愍，為作利益聞深法故。』
translation: Now, I should give rise to pity and compassion for the sake of benefiting those who hear the profound teaching.'

source_sentence: 「『居家自性說菩提，　　欲無分別無破壞，
translation: 'The self-nature of the householder teaches enlightenment, wanting it without discrimination or destruction.

source_sentence: 若覺此行演說者，　　彼覺菩提無上安。
translation: If someone perceives this practice and explains it, they'll perceive the unsurpassed peace of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 瞋行自性如菩提，　　世師智者已為說，
translation: The essential nature of the practice of hatred is as enlightenment: The wise one, the teacher of the worlds, has explained this.

source_sentence: 若覺如是法行者，　　彼覺菩提二足上。
translation: If someone perceives such practice of the Dharma, they perceive enlightenment above the two feet of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 愚癡示現菩提等，　　菩提愚癡無異性，
translation: Foolishly manifesting enlightenment and so forth, Enlightenment and folly have no different natures.

source_sentence: 此示現癡以一行，　　當覺菩提無上道。
translation: This shows that with one practice of delusion, they'll awaken to the unsurpassed path of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若有已說諸見行，　　及彼菩提勝上覺，
translation: If there are those who have explained the practice of views and their supreme awakening to enlightenment,

source_sentence: 於此二行中說者，　　見行不得於菩提。
translation: Those who speak of these two practices don't attain enlightenment in their views and practices.

source_sentence: 諸佛之法甚深妙，　　不以有得能知見，
translation: The teachings of the Buddhas are so profound and subtle That they cannot be known or seen by anyone.

source_sentence: 離於分別有所依，　　善巧智者覺菩提。
translation: Being free of discrimination and having a basis, the skillful wise awaken to enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若能捨離諸分別，　　及以持戒我慢見，
translation: If they can abandon discriminations And observe precepts, self-conceit and conceit, They’ll attain enlightenment.

source_sentence: 依恃多聞而自矜，　　捨是等已覺菩提。
translation: Relying on well-versed people and self-respecting, they abandon this enlightenment after realizing it.

source_sentence: 寧處居家樂貪欲，　　若聞此法不驚疑，
translation: It’s better to live at home, enjoying pleasure and craving. If one hears this teaching, they won’t be frightened or doubtful.

source_sentence: 信解導師所說法，　　能於一行廣演說。
translation: They believe and understand the doctrine taught by the Guide, And can expound it extensively in one line.

source_sentence: 不用此教中出家，　　有所得見在閑處，
translation: They don’t need to leave home in the midst of this teaching, but they should stay in a secluded place with gainful views.

source_sentence: 於我想中常繫著，　　起念我當證菩提。
translation: Being always attached to self, they give rise to thoughts of self that will realize enlightenment.

source_sentence: 所有動念所演說，　　彼等皆是魔羅網，
translation: All the teachings that are expounded in every moment of thought Are all like Māra’s net.

source_sentence: 若知諸法如虛空，　　彼則無有於動念。
translation: If someone knows all dharmas are like space, Then they have no thoughts of movement.

source_sentence: 諸如來有如是法，　　諸普眼等說一行，
translation: The enlightened ones have such a teaching; Universal Eyes, etc., explain one practice:

source_sentence: 煩惱菩提二無二，　　不得煩惱及菩提。
translation: Defilement and enlightenment are two and nondual, but they don't attain afflictions or enlightenment.

translation: If they don’t discriminate desire and anger, And don’t discriminate delusion, etc.

source_sentence: 捨離彼此於二者，　　彼覺菩提諸導師。
translation: Those who abandon each other in two, they awaken to the guides of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若不住於有所得，　　亦不有念及不動，
translation: If he doesn’t abide in something to be attained, Nor does he have mindfulness or immovability.

source_sentence: 不起我想無依處，　　彼覺菩提無上安。
translation: They don’t give rise to the idea that self has no basis, and they realize enlightenment as unsurpassed peace.

source_sentence: 若捨分別於分別，　　諂曲幻偽與嫉妬，
translation: If they abandon discrimination and rely on discrimination, flattery, illusion, hypocrisy, and jealousy,

source_sentence: 樂行頭陀戒福德，　　彼覺菩提無量眼。
translation: Joyfully practicing the virtue of ascetic precepts, they perceive enlightenment with measureless eyes.

source_sentence: 若聞此法無所捨，　　於廣說時亦不疑，
translation: If someone hears this teaching without giving up anything, they don’t doubt it when explaining it in detail.

source_sentence: 彼當速成兩足尊，　　世間無上智自在。
translation: They will quickly become two-legged honored ones, Unsurpassed in the world in knowledge and freedom.

source_sentence: 甚深諸法最妙勝，　　不可思量寂無流，
translation: The most sublime of the profound teachings Is inconceivable, tranquil and pure.

source_sentence: 若不開發我見者，　　難覺於多俱致劫。』
translation: If someone doesn't develop a view of self, it's difficult to perceive many simultaneous eons.'

translation: At the time, when that monk Beneficent Upāsaka Bodhisattva spoke this verse, sixty-six nayutas in the sky above him attained the tolerance of the nonarising of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 復有六十二千眾生，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Again, there were 62,000 sentient beings who aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「爾時寂定威儀比丘，聞是偈已無喜樂意，心生熱惱遍身皆腫。
translation: After hearing this verse, the monk in silent meditation with deportment didn't rejoice when he heard it, and his mind became feverish and all his bodies swelled up.

source_sentence: 於是人所反生慈心，思惟於此一慈心故餘皆瞋恨。
translation: That person then becomes compassionate and contemplates this one kindness, so the rest are angry.

source_sentence: 於彼時間大地開裂，彼現身墮阿鼻地獄，住於彼中億那由他百千歲數受大極苦。
translation: At the time, the earth was split open, and they fell into avīci hell in their present body, where they stayed for millions of years and hundreds of thousands of years to experience great extreme pain.

source_sentence: 於彼命終即受生於見毒蛇中，如是次第經於多億那由他等百千生中，二惡處行，
translation: At the end of their life, they'll be born in a poisonous snake that sees them. In this order, they'll pass through many hundreds of millions of births and so forth, which are two bad places to go.

source_sentence: 大阿鼻獄、大叫喚獄。
translation: Great avīci hell and great screaming hell.

source_sentence: 還復生彼見毒蛇中，以彼如是不善根故，滿足經於六十二億那由他等百千劫數。

source_sentence: 以彼往昔於上利益菩薩，生一慈心以眼觀視，以彼善根從彼處終得受人身，
translation: Because of their past kindness toward the bodhisattvas above, they gave rise to a compassionate mind and looked over them with their eyes, and because of those good roots from that place they were ultimately able to receive human bodies.

source_sentence: 由彼慈心有熏習故。
translation: It's because their mind of kindness has permeation.

source_sentence: 又復以彼見毒蛇母，而於彼所起慈心故，復聞如是深妙法故，今得如是利智神通。
translation: Again, it's because they see the mother of poisonous snakes and give rise to compassion for them that they hear such a profound and marvelous teaching, and now they attain such sharp wisdom and supernormal abilities.

translation: Those monks who benefited the superior bodhisattvas at that time shouldn't have any different views, for it was me myself.

source_sentence: 諸善男子！
translation: “O sons of the virtuous!

translation: At the time, there was a king with courage and strength, and this is the present-day bodhisattva who has nothing.

translation: It's because of such angry thoughts in the past at the bodhisattva's side that they were subject to such difficult-to-know and fearful karmic hindrances and afflictions.

source_sentence: 諸善男子！
translation: “O sons of the virtuous!

source_sentence: 以如是故，若有菩薩當欲淨於諸業障者，於諸菩薩恭敬尊重如教師想。
translation: Because of this, if there are bodhisattvas who want to purify the karmic hindrances, they'll be honored and venerated by bodhisattvas as teachers.

source_sentence: 諸善男子！

translation: He then answered, Now, I'm seeking all the words that they have, but the places where they can explain them are unobtainable; therefore, I'm silent and don't answer.

translation: For hundreds of millions of eons I have known that for the sake of sentient beings I abstain from useless speech. Beneficent to all living beings, gentle and graceful, pleasant and pleasurable, they are all beautiful and wonderful.

source_sentence: 歡喜踊躍無有麁澁，依時利益不生瞋恨，說如是言：『無有眾生怨恨於我。』
translation: Rejoicing and jumping for joy without anger, he relies on the benefits of time and doesn't become angry or resentful, saying, 'There are no sentient beings who have grudges against me.'

translation: What advantage do you see that you don't show your body?

translation: He then answered, Now, you should ask the Bhagavān.

translation: What kind of benefit does this nonexistent bodhisattva see that he doesn't show his body?

source_sentence: 唯除我身，於此三界無有眾生，如是身相與其等者，唯除神通所化勝身，
translation: With the exception of my own body, there is no sentient being in any of these three worlds. The characteristics of a bodhisattva like this are similar to those of all living beings here: except for the transcendent body created by supernormal powers.

source_sentence: 成就如是業果報故。
translation: It's because they accomplish the results of such actions.

translation: Don't let all women see it; they must be stained by confusion here, unable to hear the Dharma or do anything, abandoning their original husbands' food and drink without rejoicing.

source_sentence: 染愛迷著多受苦惱。
translation: Defilement, craving, and delusion are often painful and distressing.

translation: Because they see such faults and distress, they don't show their bodies.

translation: At that point, the fearless bodhisattva and the great assembly all had doubts and thought, What's the shape of this body of the bodhisattva who has no existence?

source_sentence: 而今世尊作如是說？」
translation: Now, the Bhagavān has made such a statement?

translation: The twenty-eight such women rose from their seats with their sisters, dismounted and presented the World-honored One with a necklace of offerings, knelt on their right knees to the ground, joined their palms.

translation: He said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

translation: Such is the merit of the enlightening being Who teaches that there is nothing to be possessed, so may we receive the Buddha’s spiritual power and be able to see his body.

source_sentence: 莫以別身而示我等，我今欲見菩薩實身。」
translation: Don't show us a separate body, for now I want to see the bodhisattva's true body.

source_sentence: 爾時，佛告善女人等：「汝今欲見無所有菩薩成就色身，今欲見耶？」
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the good women, Now do you want to see the form body of the bodhisattva who has accomplished nothing, or do you want to see it now?

source_sentence: 彼等答言：「唯然，世尊！
translation: They replied, Yes, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等有疑，願為開解。」
translation: We have doubts, so may we be enlightened.

source_sentence: 佛言：「諸女！
translation: The Buddha said, Women!

source_sentence: 汝等今者，見彼身已有何利益？
translation: What advantage would you have to see that body now?

source_sentence: 汝今勿有還家之意，當捨眷屬，若見彼身安住具足一切功德。」
translation: Now, you mustn't have the intention to return home; you must abandon your retinue if you see that person's body abiding peacefully and fully endowed with all merits.

source_sentence: 彼諸女言：「我等今者一切能捨，決定當見彼菩薩身。」
translation: The women said, Now that we can abandon them all, we'll surely see the bodhisattva's body.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告彼菩薩無所有言：「汝無所有！
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān addressed that bodhisattva as nonexistent, saying, You have nothing!

source_sentence: 此等諸女欲見汝身。」
translation: These women want to see you.

source_sentence: 彼言：「世尊已言，許可彼姊妹等示現我身？」
translation: They said, Bhagavān, have you promised to allow those sisters to show me their bodies?

source_sentence: 佛言：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha said, Good man!

source_sentence: 我已許之。
translation: I've given my permission.

source_sentence: 多人意喜欲見汝身，當有利益，得勝身心，得妙身心，得淨身心。
translation: Many people are delighted to see you, and it will be beneficial for them to attain superior body and mind, marvelous body and mind, and pure body and mind.

source_sentence: 若見汝身，即當決定於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，得轉女身成丈夫身。
translation: If you see your body, you'll surely attain unsurpassed, correct enlightenment and turn the female body into the male body.

source_sentence: 汝今已有如是淨願，於多諸佛以百千身種諸善根，住是願中於三界中，
translation: You have already undertaken such a pure vow, planting roots of goodness in the bodies of hundreds of thousands of buddhas. In this vow you dwell in the three realms:

source_sentence: 願我當得最勝佛身。
translation: May I attain the most excellent buddha body.

source_sentence: 所有眾生見我身者，彼等決定住於菩提，所有女人悉轉女身。
translation: All the sentient beings who see my body will surely abide in enlightenment, and all the women they have are transformed into women.

source_sentence: 若於我所種善根已，思惟如是甚深法已得忍本性，願當入於真如法中，
translation: If you have planted roots of goodness in what belongs to me and contemplate such profound principles, having attained the essence of forbearance, may you enter the teaching of reality.

source_sentence: 願當具足諸菩薩法，開現親近於諸佛法。」
translation: May they be fully endowed with the bodhisattva's teachings and reveal their intimacy with the Buddha's teachings.

source_sentence: 彼無所有菩薩，聞佛此說，作如是言：「如是，世尊！
translation: When that nonexistent bodhisattva heard the Buddha teach this, he said, So it is, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如世尊教。」
translation: It's as the Bhagavān teaches.

source_sentence: 即於手中一一指端皆放光明，一一光明至王舍城，於彼人家皆悉出現，
translation: At the tip of each finger he held a ray of light. Each ray of light reached to the city of Rājagṛha and appeared in that house.

source_sentence: 彼諸光明有諸眾生，見於彼等從地踊出，化成諸華縱廣一尺，昔所未見色香具足。
translation: Those lights have sentient beings who see them emerge from the ground and transform into flowers one foot long and one foot wide, which they haven't seen in the past that are endowed with color and fragrance.
